**Welcome to Talespin‚Äîa gateway to virtual worlds built to help with your personal and professional growth.** Whether you‚Äôre a seasoned executive or a curious learner, we are here to help you take your skills development to the next level.

Embark on an enriching journey with our vast library of immersive learning content, thoughtfully designed to mirror real-life situations so you can practice the most important skills to get ahead‚Äîskills often called ‚Äú**power skills**,‚Äù or ‚Äú**human skills**.‚Äù

{1397908357778530}

changelog.change_log:
The latest release includes a new world, ‚ÄúSuper Human Intelligence‚Äù, which expands our vast library of immersive learning content to help future-proof your growth in an ever-changing world.

Super Human Intelligence: Is the world getting faster, or are humans falling behind? Maybe both. Regardless of how quickly our world moves, our capacity to think critically makes us unique, for now. Our ability to talk to each other, understand different points-of-view, and reach compromise may be getting rusty. Enhance your ability to manage interpersonal situations. Refine your Super Human intelligence.

New modules added:
- To A.I., or Not to A.I.
- Gardening with Bullies:
- Breaking News: Facts Matter:

We‚Äôve also expanded our content for "Where'd Everybody Go? The Business Leader's Guide to the Decentralized Workforce."

New modules added:
- Championing Your Web Vision
- Potential of Virtual Worlds
- Building Organizational Memory
- Sustaining an Accountability Culture
- Cultivating Teamwork & Belonging
- Building an Equitable Workplace
- Managing Remote Teams
- Thriving in Adversity
- Logical Persuasion

Exciting updates to existing modules:
- Exploring Immersive Learning
- Trust & Collaborative Change
- Cultivating Diversity & Inclusion
- Success With Metrics

Begin your journey with Talespin today as we continue to push the boundaries of VR learning!
